A closed convex function is convex on Unknown identifier `univ`univ.

lemma convexFunctionOn_univ_of_closedConvexFunction {n : } {f : (Fin n ) EReal} (hf_closed : ClosedConvexFunction f) : ConvexFunctionOn (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n ))) f := by simpa [ConvexFunction] using hf_closed.1

polarConvex {n : } (f : (Fin n ) EReal) (xStar : Fin n ) : ERealpolarConvex preserves nonnegativity, closed convexity, and vanishing at 0 : 0 on the subtype.

lemma polarConvex_mem_subtype_nonneg_closedConvex_zero {n : } (f : {g : (Fin n ) EReal // ( x, 0 g x) ClosedConvexFunction g g 0 = 0}) : ( x, 0 polarConvex f.1 x) ClosedConvexFunction (polarConvex f.1) polarConvex f.1 0 = 0 := by have hf_conv : ConvexFunctionOn (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n ))) f.1 := convexFunctionOn_univ_of_closedConvexFunction (n := n) f.property.2.1 have h := polarConvex_nonneg_closedConvex_and_bipolar_eq_convexFunctionClosure (n := n) (f := f.1) hf_conv f.property.1 f.property.2.2 dsimp at h rcases h with h_nonneg, h_closed, h_zero, _ exact h_nonneg, h_closed, h_zero

polarConvex {n : } (f : (Fin n ) EReal) (xStar : Fin n ) : ERealpolarConvex is involutive on the nonnegative closed convex subclass with Unknown identifier `f`sorry = 0 : Propf 0 = 0.

lemma polarConvex_involutive_on_subtype {n : } (f : {g : (Fin n ) EReal // ( x, 0 g x) ClosedConvexFunction g g 0 = 0}) : polarConvex (polarConvex f.1) = f.1 := by have hf_conv : ConvexFunctionOn (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n ))) f.1 := convexFunctionOn_univ_of_closedConvexFunction (n := n) f.property.2.1 have h := polarConvex_nonneg_closedConvex_and_bipolar_eq_convexFunctionClosure (n := n) (f := f.1) hf_conv f.property.1 f.property.2.2 dsimp at h have hbot : x, f.1 x ( : EReal) := hbot_of_nonneg (f := f.1) f.property.1 have hclosure : convexFunctionClosure f.1 = f.1 := convexFunctionClosure_eq_of_closedConvexFunction (n := n) f.property.2.1 hbot calc polarConvex (polarConvex f.1) = convexFunctionClosure f.1 := h.2.2.2 _ = f.1 := hclosure
